Articles.Content:
floor n+1

oh i'll grab my luck with that floor

at this floor you just get a link http://imgur.com/GrLwNPR

I go up. 

I don't die. Floor 1566, conquered.

Floor 1577

 

You find me struggling to think of what to put on this floor

Floor 1578

There is a tank. A container yes. What does it contain? Tanks. Ya, the vehicular version. And guess what THOSE tanks have? Fuel tanks! And guess what are in those fuel tanks? More! And in those, and those, and those, and those...

floor 1579

there is a taco, raining
Floor 1580: This floor is empty, except for a hole into the Time Vortex. If you look into it, you might be inspired, or you may run away, or you could go mad. Do you choose to look?

Floor 1581.

You realize you are really at the top of a really, really big rocket

Floor 1582

The control panel for the rocket!

Floor 1583

There's the nosecone of the rocket, as well as a dried ice cream stand.
1584:  William of Orange is assassinated via a juicer. His successor, Clementine of Tangerine, promptly arises to the throne and becomes an aperitif...
1586: We need to upgrade the gravity generator; I'm floating up towards the ceiling.

1587: BN GP7 #1587.

Edited March 30, 2017 by UnionPacific1983WP
1588: you see a sign saying welcome to @53miner53 space shuttle testing facility, and you run as fast as you can to the next floor.

Floor 1589: A police box sits in the middle of the floor. There are scattered angel statues around it, but they aren't doing anything. As you move towards the phone box, the lights begin to flicker,,,

F1590 - You are on the top of the building...

The problem is, there is a rope hanging from another, seemingly upside down skyscraper. You climbed into the said tower, and find out that it is not upside down at all!

It is hanging from an asteroid!

F1591 - Nothing much. You found a normal living room, and an staircase up to the next floor. You closed the hatch to the F1590, and prepare for the ascension again. You wonder what would you find on the next floor, so you kept walking up.
Floor 1592: You find the rusted remains of an old steam engine. No idea why it's this far up...
Floor 1593: you find a broken old Diesel engine and suddenly floor 1592 makes a little more sense.

Floor 1594.

You can't get so there? Can you? And yeah ,there is party for all people who haven't made any explosion in KSP.

1595:  Looks like a full-blown Rave is going on, but everyone on the floor is frozen in place.

 

You ponder this for a moment, then continue on...
1596: Everyone is arguing over which engine to use on the first stage of their rocket. All the choices would be better for an upper stage.

1597: This floor is just a nice waiting area.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Spoiler

What, you expected this to turn dark in some way? It's just a lobby for something. You don't know for what. Probably just a doctors office.
1598: Filled with radon-222, what could possibly go wrong?

1599: a floor where you can play a game with spider and else: http://store.steampowered.com/app/355240/ oh oh oh the peops who make this are seriously brain messed up ^^

Edited April 11, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''
1600: You realize you're now 5.28 kilometers away from the first floor.
